result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Casey R Prescott

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 8:02 am 
INCLUDES 16CF945, 15CM471, 16CM1130, AND 16CF505. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty Rick Cveykus. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to: 
In 16CF945: Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 5 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 6 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 7 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM471: Ct. 1 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
In 16CM1130: Ct. 1 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 16CF505: Ct. 2 (Possess with Intent - Amphetamine/PTAC)>>AMEND TO Possession of Methamphetamine pursuant to 961.41(3g)(g). 
                    : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 16CF945: Ct. 2 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST
                    : Ct. 3 (Possession of THC)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Misd. BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 16CF505: Ct. 1 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Amended Ct. 2 (Possession of Methamphetamine)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 3 years probation - CONDITIONS ON ALL: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; AODA and follow through; maintain fulltime employment/school/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 9 hours CS per week; maintain absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; DNA sample and surcharge; CC. 

COURT ORDERS as CONDITION of probation on Ct. 2 in 16CF945 ONLY: 90 days MCJ with huber for work if def qualifies. 

COURT finds the def entitled to 7 days jail credit on each file.  
COURT finds def eligible to petition for expungement upon successful completion of probation. 
COURT notes no objection to transfer of probation to def's place of employment. 
Adj: 8:20 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 18, 2016 at 08:00 am.
and Demand for Discovery & Inspection

-Defendnat's
**Includes 16CM471, 16CM1130,16CF505 & 16CF945
Pre-trial conference on September 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Review hearing on August 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Rick Cveykus
includes 15CM471, 16CM1130
Status conference on June 29, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on June 7, 2016 at 11:15 am.
Status conference on April 6, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Rescheduled per defendant's request
Status conference at 03-30-2016 11:00 am
Status conference at 02-03-2016 09:30 am
Status conference at 02-03-2016 09:30 am
Status conference at 01-20-2016 10:30 am
Status conference at 12-02-2015 10:30 am
Status conference at 11-03-2015 09:45 am

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:36 am 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
State notes deft had contacted court noting he confused date and time of missed appearance. 
COURT vacates bond forfeiture. 
COURT advises parties to see JA to set future dates. 
Adj: 9:37 am
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing at 09-11-2015 09:00 am
Defendant does not appear.
Status conference at 08-27-2015 10:45 am
Status conference on July 23, 2015 at 11:30 am.

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 11:27 a.m. 
Defendant appears in person without counsel. 
Court questions defendant re: Employment & Income. 
Court denies appointment of counsel, defendant not indigent. 
Adj: 11:28 a.m. 
C: Br.3
Pre-trial conference on May 29, 2015 at 09:20 am.
Indigency hearing on May 19, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Calendar call on May 13, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:04 pm 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
COURT questions deft regarding counsel. 
Deft states intent to contact the public defender's office. 
COURT leaves jury trial on at this time. 
COURT sets calendar call on 5/13/2015 at 1pm - COURT advises deft to work toward obtaining counsel and that he must appear at calendar call if has not obtained representation at that time. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 2:05 pm
Jury Trial on May 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 13, 2015 at 01:40 pm.
Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.    Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 before 4/13/15.
